p: The data showing the antioxidant enzyme activities in tissues of infected lambs are presented in Table 2. No effect of Hmix and/or Zn supplementation on the liver total SOD activity was detected, while the Hmix Ã— Zn interaction ( p = 0.014) affected Cu/Zn SOD activity in the liver, with increased activity in the Hmix group compared to CON ( p < 0.01). The activity of both SODs did not change in the kidney tissue, but a tendency towards increased SOD activities (SOD, p = 0.052; Cu/Zn SOD, p = 0.063) in the Hmix treatments was determined.
